reviewIssueModelChanged

public void reviewIssueModelChanged(ReviewIssueModelEvent event)
Adds and removes the ReviewIssue instance to the container, depending upon the event type. Adds it if the event type is ADD and EDIT. Removes it if the event type is DELETE.

Specified by:
reviewIssueModelChanged in interface IReviewIssueModelListener
Parameters:
event - the ReviewIssueModelEvent instance.
